metaTags.metaTitle: Cloudflare Free SSL/TLS | Get SSL Certificates
metaTags.metaDescription: Cloudflare offers free SSL/TLS certificates to secure your web traffic. Improve performance and save time on TLS certificate management with Cloudflare.

metaImage.description: DO NOT REMOVE, THIS IS CLOUDFLARE'S GLOBAL OG META ASSET

relatedBlades.title: SSL/TLS certificates
relatedBlades.subtitle: Fast, easy, free TLS certificates for websites
relatedBlades.copy: Protect users and data without slowing down web apps by relying on Cloudflare for TLS. Save time on TLS certificate management and keep certificates up to date to avoid browser security warnings and search engine deprioritization.

columnContent.title: Protect users and data
columnContent.description: TLS ensures data passing between users and servers is encrypted. Prevent on-path attacks, and safeguard user data to protect your applications and meet compliance requirements.

columnContent.title: Improve website performance
columnContent.description: By using the latest protocols and operating close to users, Cloudflare TLS minimizes latency to speed up webpage load times.

columnContent.title: Boost traffic to website
columnContent.description: Search engines favor websites that use TLS. Avoid browser warnings present on unencrypted sites that dissuade users from visiting.

columnContent.title: Deploy effortlessly
columnContent.description: Set up certificates for a domain in less than 5 minutes. Keep your hosting provider. No code changes required.

relatedBlades.title: Faster, more secure websites with TLS
relatedBlades.copy:
Formerly known as SSL, Transport Layer Security (TLS) encrypts web traffic and authenticates origin servers. Cloudflare TLS certificates auto-renew, saving time and money and preventing service disruptions.

Cloudflare also has advanced customization options for enterprises, including [Advanced Certificate Manager](https://www.cloudflare.com/advanced-certificate-manager/), keyless SSL, custom hostnames, and [SSL for SaaS](https://www.cloudflare.com/application-services/products/ssl-for-saas-providers/).

imageAssetFile.altText: Illustration of an app security award
imageAssetFile.title: What is SSL

relatedBlades.title: Learn how to deploy TLS in complex enterprise environments

content.value: "Using Cloudflare's TLS certificates, which automatically renew, we save about $50,000 a year, both in administrative costs and lost revenue from outages due to expired certificates."
John Turner, Application Security Lead, LendingTree

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare TLS helps you protect your brand and keep your websites and users secure, and can be deployed in under 5 minutes.

columnContent.title: Encrypt sensitive data
columnContent.description: TLS encrypts all content passing between server and user to prevent data leaks.

columnContent.title: Maintain and increase site traffic
columnContent.description: Using TLS avoids browser security warnings and search engine deprioritization.

columnContent.title: Save time on certificate management
columnContent.description: Cloudflare issues and auto-renews certificates for you.

relatedBlades.htmlContent: Explore more use cases

relatedBlades.description: Helping organizations worldwide streamline certificate management

relatedBlades.title: Upgrade your website security and performance with free SSL & so much more!

planFeatures.name: Web Application Firewall (WAF)
planFeatures.description: Cloudflare Web Application Firewall's intuitive dashboard enables users to build powerful rules through easy clicks and also provides Terraform integration. Every request to the WAF is inspected against the rule engine and the threat intelligence curated from protecting millions of websites. Suspicious requests can be blocked, challenged or logged as per the needs of the user while legitimate requests are routed to the destination, agnostic of whether it lives on-premise or in the cloud.

planFeatures.name: Accelerated Mobile Pages (AMP)
planFeatures.description: Mirage automatically optimizes image loading through virtualized and lazyloaded images. It detects the browser type of a visitor and optimizes performance for the particular device, improving the performance of images on a mobile connection.
